Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Obviously a teacher will be able to give very specific feedback that ties back to how to complete and conplete well a speciric piece of assessment for a specific class or context. AI will always struggle with being able to so this as it does not have the required context.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: No differences. Feedback is feedback it didn't make me feel either good or bad.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI feedback will mainly be general and non-specific to a broader context we as humans are able to perceive or experience. A teacher will have a greater understanding of what feedback to provide relevant to the context in which it is required.
